title: Use average value to find endpoint

content.question:
Find the value of c for which the average value of f over the interval <math aria-label="negative 5 less than or equal to x which is less than or equal to c">
 <mrow>
 <mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext> </mtext><mo>≤</mo><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo>≤</mo><mtext> </mtext><mi>c</mi></mrow>
</math> is <math aria-label="one half">
 <mfrac>
 <mn>1</mn>
 <mn>2</mn>
 </mfrac>

</math>
.

frqParts.text:
Find the value of c for which the average value of f over the interval <math aria-label="negative 5 less than or equal to x which is less than or equal to c">
 <mrow>
 <mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext> </mtext><mo>≤</mo><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo>≤</mo><mtext> </mtext><mi>c</mi></mrow>
</math> is <math aria-label="one half">
 <mfrac>
 <mn>1</mn>
 <mn>2</mn>
 </mfrac>

</math>
.

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
